member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.TestRunner.TestRunner.RunTestAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Executes a test based on a collection of transcripts in sequence, in the order in which they exist in the collection. This method can be used to compose a complex scenario formed by a set of smaller scenarios defined in each transcript.
member.param: The collection of transcripts to execute.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.TestRunner.TestRunner.RunTestAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Executes a single scenario based on the transcript passed to the method.
member.param: The transcript that contains the scenario to execute.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.TestRunner.TestRunner.RunTestAsync(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Executes a scenario utilizing a parameterized transcript.
member.param: The parameters to passed to the transcript.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.TestRunner.TestRunner.GetActivitiesAsync
member.summary: Gets a collection of activities returned by the test bot.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.TestRunner.TestRunner.SendActivityAsync(Microsoft.Bot.Schema.Activity)
member.summary: Sends a single Activity to the test bot.
member.param: The Activity to send to the bot.
